Topic.Title: Make room name display in Bold in online version? (Still seeking an answer!)

Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

I know this is doable in the offline editor, is there an option in the online?

Thanks.
Posts.HTML:
Hi,

I know this is doable in the offline editor, is there an option in the online?

Thanks.

Posts.EditableText:
**Yes.** It should be in exactly in the same place. When in the online editor, click "game" in the left side list and go to the "Room Descriptions" tab. There should be a line near the bottom that says _"Use 'You are in' prefix (turn off to display room name in bold instead)"_. Just uncheck this box and voila! You're ready to go. Hope that helped!

Below is a screenshot of the correct screen to be on:

<https://1drv.ms/i/s!AkXzeGbPbRgmg07KRaAz3bur9xVj>
